Title: Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045 - Sustainable War
Director: Shinji Aramaki, Michihito Fujii, Kenji Kamiyama
Writer: Harumi Doki, Ryô Higaki, Kenji Kamiyama
Actors: Atsuko Tanaka, Osamu Saka, Akio Ôtsuka
Plot: In the year 2045, cybernetic mercenary Motoko Kusanagi returns to Section 9 to face the threat of the posthumans.
